body_html:
@goldsborough the reason for #4752 breakage is that .data() method for half tensors
https://github.com/csarofeen/pytorch/blob/1409d0034b7e6f971045991b56efe35796578ad3/aten/src/ATen/templates/TensorMethods.h#L52-L57 was removed from TensorMethods.h, and did not land anywhere else. Can you please look into it?
body_text:
@goldsborough the reason for #4752 breakage is that .data() method for half tensors
https://github.com/csarofeen/pytorch/blob/1409d0034b7e6f971045991b56efe35796578ad3/aten/src/ATen/templates/TensorMethods.h#L52-L57 was removed from TensorMethods.h, and did not land anywhere else. Can you please look into it?
body:
@goldsborough the reason for #4752 breakage is that .data() method for half tensors
https://github.com/csarofeen/pytorch/blob/1409d0034b7e6f971045991b56efe35796578ad3/aten/src/ATen/templates/TensorMethods.h#L52-L57 was removed from TensorMethods.h, and did not land anywhere else. Can you please look into it?
